class models.stream.AbstractMultioutputClassifier(classifier)[source]

Bases: Wrapper, Classifier

learn_one(x, y, **kwargs)[source]

Update the model with a set of features x and a label y.

Parameters:

  • x – A dictionary of features.

  • y – A label.

predict_one(x, **kwargs)[source]

Predict the label of a set of features x.

Parameters:

x – A dictionary of features.

Return type:

The predicted label.

predict_proba_one(x, predict_for=None)[source]

Predict the probability of each label for a dictionary of features x.

Parameters:

x – A dictionary of features.

Return type:

A dictionary that associates a probability which each label.
